Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.DepartureBoardRequest

  • Packages that use DepartureBoardRequest 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility
    The package urbanmobility provides classes, callbacks, and enumerations that can be used to enable functionality related to public transit such as search for nearby transit stations and requests for departure boards.

    • Uses of DepartureBoardRequest in com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility that return DepartureBoardRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DepartureBoardRequest RequestManager.createDepartureBoardRequest(GeoCoordinate stationCoordinate, java.lang.String stationId, RequestManager.ResponseListener<DepartureBoard> listener)
      Creates an instance of DepartureBoardRequest.
      DepartureBoardRequest RequestManager.createDepartureBoardRequest(GeoCoordinate stationCoordinate, java.lang.String stationId, ResponseListener<DepartureBoard> listener)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use RequestManager.createDepartureBoardRequest(GeoCoordinate, String, ResponseListener) instead.
      DepartureBoardRequest DepartureBoardRequest.setRealTimeInfoReturned(boolean returnRealTimeInfo)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use DepartureBoardRequest.setRequestRealTimeInfoEnabled(boolean) instead.
      DepartureBoardRequest DepartureBoardRequest.setRequestRealTimeInfoEnabled(boolean returnRealTimeInfo)
      Set if RealTimeInfo for found departures should be included in the response.
      DepartureBoardRequest DepartureBoardRequest.setStrict(boolean strict)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use DepartureBoardRequest.setStrictResultEnabled(boolean) instead.
      DepartureBoardRequest DepartureBoardRequest.setStrictResultEnabled(boolean strict)
      Indicates that departure board should include results only for given stop, not also for related stops.
      DepartureBoardRequest DepartureBoardRequest.setTime(java.util.Date time)
      Sets the time point after which departures should be returned.
